column4: I have installed all fine apart from one problem it wouldnt auto find my network so I config'd it myself. I am pretty sure ive done it right. Then when the install was all finished (or so i believe). It started to load then came up with and error on X server. It offers me information about the error and says to check for new versions of X server in the internet, and when reading further down it says "no screens found"
oh and btw im using the x64 version
any one who can help me?

I have installed all fine apart from one problem it wouldnt auto find my network so I config'd it myself. I am pretty sure ive done it right. Then when the install was all finished (or so i believe). It started to load then came up with and error on X server. It offers me information about the error and says to check for new versions of X server in the internet, and when reading further down it says "no screens found"
your problem is not a network problem
look at the errors it gives you
that will tell you what you need to fix when you reconfigure xorg
stupendo44 : what do i need to do then? do you want more info from the error?
then your xorg.conf is telling xorg to look for something other than your video card
: I have a Radeon X800 - PCI express
